articles.description: The case at the North Rockhampton Nursing Centre is clearly on the Government’s mind. The Department has issued another stern reminder to aged care
articles.content:
The case at the North Rockhampton Nursing Centre is clearly on the Governments mind.
The Department has issued another stern reminder to aged care operators and their staff to stay home if they are unwell even if they only feel mildly unwell.

articles.author: Kelly Burch
articles.title: What is Kawasaki disease? How to recognise the symptoms in your child - Business Insider Australia
articles.description: Kawasaki disease, also known as mucocutaneous lymph node syndrome, is an inflammation of the blood vessels that is most common in children. About 75% of Kawasaki disease cases occur in kids younger than five years old.
articles.content:
Kawasaki disease, also known as mucocutaneous lymph node syndrome, is an inflammation of the blood vessels that is most common in children. About 75% of Kawasaki disease cases occur in kids younger than five years old.

articles.author: By Guy Faulconbridge
articles.title: Children might not transmit COVID-19 - Daily Telegraph
articles.description: There are tentative signs that children may not spread the novel coronavirus as much as adults, two top epidemiologists said on Tuesday, though they cautioned that the bad news was that human immunity may not last that long.
articles.content:
